name: Kreepy and Krawly
description:
A hard puzzle-platformer about two best buds on a quest to recover their stolen leftovers. Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Controls (Keyboard Only):

  • Walk - Left/A, Right/D
  • Jump - Space/Z
  • Drop (while on ceiling) - Down/S
  • Quit - Escape
  • Mute Music - M
